summary: THE TRANSMISSION FAILED ON OUR 1999 FORD WINDSTAR WHILE MY WIFE WAS DRIVING DOWN THE ROAD CAUSING HER TO HAVE TO UNEXPECTEDLY PULL OVER.  THE VAN ONLY HAS 35K MILES ON IT.  WE HAVE TO REPLACE THE TRANSMISSION AFTER SO FEW MILES.  AFTER PERUSING THE INTERNET, I DISCOVERED THAT THIS IS A COMMON PROBLEM ON THIS VEHICLE.
